_header: In sleep been laid all song dance or disport
_description: On the death of his lady, by Charles d’Orléans — three 8-line stanzas and 4-line Envoy

BLHar682.First Lines:
IN slepe ben leyd all song daunce or disportAlso prays of bewte
                    bote or gantilesse…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…Wherfore y wolde my lijf sum nedy wightHit had for now of
                    nought as lyue y here
